headline: Does Recent Share Price Strength Leave Franklin Resources Trading Ahead of Its Fundamentals in 2025?
summary: If you are wondering whether Franklin Resources is quietly turning into a value opportunity or if the stock is already fairly priced, you are in the right place to unpack what the market might be missing. The shares have been ticking higher recently, up 3.6% over the last week, 2.8% over the past month, and delivering a 16.2% gain year to date, building on a 13.3% return over the past year. These moves come as investors digest ongoing shifts in global markets, with renewed attention on...
